title: Spirit Guard Udyr
body: So i hate to report this and have my skin down for a week again but there is another bug with spirit guard. No matter what stance you swtich into the pheonix sound clip always plays.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're still working on a couple bugs for this guy - one of them being this sound issue. We won't be disabling the skin due to the issue, though.
Just letting you know, its not just Phoenix stance, I've been having this same issue with Turtle Stance audio when I go AD Tiger Stance build rather than Phoenix.
Yup, we're aware of the issue and working on a fix! Thanks for the heads up! :]
